Name: Sidecarriage
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Hints of cider and elderflower come through in this calvados-based Sidecar .
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly in London, England. Sidecar history
Nutrition: One serving of Sidecarriage contains 201 calories
